entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `CscCompile_WithSourceCodeRedirectedViaStandardInput_ProducesLibrary` fails locally #61452
  • `AssemblyLoading_DependencyInDifferentDirectory_Delete` fails locally #61451
  • `ConstantValueToStringTest01` fails locally #61450

Closed

  • Add a means to disable HoReload at the solution/project level #56679
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable IDE0060 (unused parameters) and CA1822 (make static) in compilers layer #61453
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61446
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
